channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Webcam appears to show police running to New Orleans attack scene
item.description: The moment was captured on a webcam in the French Quarter of the city, moments after the attack happened.

item.title: Life Kit's guide to a successful Dry January
item.description: It is officially 2025 and 'Life Kit' is kicking the year off with a series to help people complete Dry January successfully. And, a look ahead for thi...

item.title: Latest details on New Orleans truck attack, suspect's identity, effect on Sugar Bowl
item.description: At least 10 people were killed early on New Year's Day when a man drove a truck into a crowd on New Orleans' Bourbon Street in what the FBI is investi...

item.title: New Orleans attack suspect 'hell-bent' on causing carnage, police say
item.description: The FBI says it is investigating the attack, which killed 10 and injured dozens, as an "act of terrorism".

item.title: $1.9 million reward offered after "brazen" heist of jewelry
item.description: Some of the property reportedly belongs to art collector Shafira Huang, said to be a multi-millionaire Instagram influencer.

item.title: Watch: BBC visits scene of deadly New Orleans attack
item.description: The BBC's Anna Adams had been celebrating New Year in the city, just a few hours before the attack.

item.title: Photos: Scenes after attack in New Orleans on New Year's Day
item.description: Authorities say the driver drove around a barricade and plowed through a crowd along Bourbon Street, the city's iconic stretch of bars and hotels near...

item.title: New Orleans New Year’s Day ramming is the latest attack to use a vehicle as a deadly weapon
Here are 9 states cutting their individual income taxes on Jan. 1
item.description: Some states are ushering in lower income tax rates in January, part of a recent push to cut taxes for their residents.

item.title: What we know about a vehicle attack on pedestrians in New Orleans’ French Quarter that killed 10
Moldova faces energy crisis as flow of Russian gas ends
item.description: Russian gas has stopped passing through Ukraine after a five-year deal expired, leaving Moldova at risk of a crisis.

item.title: New Orleans mayor says New Year's Day incident was a 'terrorist attack'
item.description: A vehicle drove into a crowd on New Orleans' famed Canal and Bourbon Street in the first hours of New Year's Day. The FBI is investigating the inciden...

item.title: Norovirus outbreaks are on the rise around the country and on cruise ships
item.description: Outbreaks of the gastrointestinal illness are surging both at sea and on land. Here's what to know.

item.title: 'The scene was just horrific' - witnesses tell of New Orleans carnage
item.description: Revellers had been celebrating the new year when a driver ploughed his pick-up truck into a large crowd.

item.title: New Orleans sheriff takes questions after truck attack
item.description: New Orleans Sheriff Susan Hutson spoke with reporters Wednesday in the aftermath of the truck attack on Bourbon Street that killed at least 10 people.

item.title: Driver rams into New Orleans crowd, killing 10 before dying in firefight with police
item.description: Investigators were combing the French Quarter for potential explosive devices, a law enforcement official told AP.

item.title: 21 states are getting minimum wage bumps in 2025
item.description: Increases in Delaware, Illinois and Rhode Island will bring those states' minimums to $15 an hour, meaning 10 states and Washington, D.C., will now ha...

item.title: Bourbon Street attack suspect identified after deadly rampage. What to know.
item.description: A man "hellbent" on creating carnage drove around barricades and hurtled down Bourbon Street in New Orleans' French Quarter, police said.
